name: Scarecrow
condition_immunities: charmed, fatigue, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The scarecrow uses Scare and makes two slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Scare
actions.desc: Each creature of the scarecrows choice within 30 feet that can see the scarecrow makes a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure  it is magically frightened for 1 minute. It repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns  ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creatures saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it  it is immune to Scare for 24 hours.

actions.name: Hat of Illusion (1/Day)
actions.desc: While wearing a hat or other head covering  the scarecrow takes on the illusory appearance of the last living humanoid to wear that hat. It requires a DC 12 Insight or Perception check to recognize the illusion. The illusion ends when the scarecrow is touched  takes damage  attacks  or uses Scare  or when the scarecrow chooses to end it as a bonus action.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While motionless, the scarecrow is indistinguishable from an ordinary scarecrow.

special_abilities.name: Flammable
special_abilities.desc: After taking fire damage, the scarecrow catches fire and takes 5 (1d10) ongoing fire damage if it isnt already suffering ongoing fire damage. A creature can spend an action to extinguish this fire.

special_abilities.name: Local Spirit
special_abilities.desc: The scarecrow is destroyed if it travels more than a mile from the place it was created.

special_abilities.name: Spell-created
special_abilities.desc: The DC for dispel magic to destroy this creature is 19.
